sn19.10:1.1: “Idhaham, avuso, gijjhakuta pabbata orohanto addasam kumbhandam purisam vehasam gacchantam.
sn19.10:1.2: So gacchantopi teva ande khandhe aropetva gacchati.
sn19.10:1.4: Tamenam gijjhapi kakapi kulalapi anupatitva anupatitva vitacchenti virajenti.
sn19.10:1.6: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmimyeva rajagahe gamakutako ahosi …pe….
sn19.10:2.5: Yo ca sibbiyati sucako hi so,
